dcterms:creator: S.-H. Poon
C. W. J. Granger
dcterms:description: The GBP/USD pair dataset is used to analyze the fluctuations in the value of the Great Britain Pound against the United States Dollar, focusing on its volatility over a specified period.
dcterms:title: GBP/USD Pair

dcterms:creator: S.-H. Poon
C. W. J. Granger
dcterms:description: The EUR/GBP pair dataset is utilized to examine the volatility of the Euro against the Great Britain Pound, particularly during significant economic events.
dcterms:title: EUR/GBP Pair

dcterms:creator: T. Bollerslev
dcterms:description: The GARCH models dataset is referenced for understanding the generalized autoregressive conditional heteroskedasticity approach to modeling volatility in financial time series.
dcterms:title: GARCH Models

dcterms:creator: E. Scott
A. L. Tucker
dcterms:description: The Implied Volatility Models dataset is used to predict currency return volatility based on options pricing models.
dcterms:title: Implied Volatility Models

dcterms:creator: A. W. Ayele
E. Gabreyohannes
Y. Y. Tesfay
dcterms:description: The Historical Volatility Models dataset examines macroeconomic determinants of volatility, specifically applied to the gold price in Ethiopia, but relevant for understanding volatility modeling.
dcterms:title: Historical Volatility Models

dcterms:creator: K. Pilbeam
K. N. Langeland
dcterms:description: The Exchange Rate Volatility dataset compares GARCH models with implied volatility forecasts for predicting exchange rate volatility.
dcterms:title: Exchange Rate Volatility
